answers.answer: Lay down and rest. If the swelling doesn't go away then it could be your blood pressure. Also if you notice any sharp pain on the top of your belly that doesn't go away, along with the swelling and a headache then go into l&d cause that's preeclampsia.
Drink lots of water and lay down, I'm 38 weeks and I feel light headed for the past couple days and that helped me
Im having some sharp pains by my vag I think it might be pressure but I'm not sure.

question: Im almost 39 wks and have been feeling light headed all day today. I have swollen fingers and I have no idea why I'm so light headed. Ladies should I be worried? At my doctors appointment yesterday my blood pressure was a little high do you think it's bc of that?
title: light headed
